name: Alice Smith
description: Love adventures and coding. Always up for a hiking trip or a good book.

name: James Whitcher
description: Passionate about technology, travel, and meeting new people. I enjoy hiking, photography, and exploring hidden coffee shops.

prompts.question: The one thing I can't live without...
I'll fall for you if...
prompts.answer: You love adventure as much as I do.

name: Sara Tan
description: Coffee lover, dog mom, and psychology nerd. Looking for someone to share deep conversations and laughter with.

prompts.question: My perfect Sunday...
prompts.answer: Yoga in the morning, then brunch with friends.

prompts.question: A fact about me that surprises people...

name: David Lee
description: Scientist by day, amateur chef by night. I enjoy puzzles, hiking, and classic movies.

prompts.question: The dorkiest thing about me is...
prompts.answer: I own more science books than novels.

name: Emma Clarke
description: Avid reader and theatre enthusiast. Always looking for a good story and good company.

prompts.question: If I could travel anywhere...
prompts.answer: I’d go to Japan during cherry blossom season.
